sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import { createOrder } from '../actions/orderActions' import { ORDER_CREATE_RESET } from '../constants/orderConstants' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' function PlaceOrderScreen() { const orderCreate = useSelector(state => state.orderCreate) const {order, error, success} = orderCreate const dispatch = useDispatch() const cart = useSelector( state => state.cart) cart.itemPrice = cart.cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0).toFixed(2) cart.shippingPrice = (cart.itemPrice < 100 ? 200 : cart.itemPrice * 0.05).toFixed(2) cart.taxPrice = Number(0.00) cart.totalPrice = (Number(cart.itemPrice) + Number(cart.shippingPrice) + Number(cart.taxPrice)).toFixed(2) const navigate = useNavigate() if(!cart.paymentMethod){ alert("no payment") navigate('/payment') } useEffect(() => { if(success){ navigate(`/order/${order._id}`) dispatch({ type: ORDER_CREATE_RESET }) } }, [success, navigate, order, dispatch]) const placeOrderHandler = () => { dispatch(createOrder({ orderItems: cart.cartItems, shippingAddress: cart.shippingAddress, paymentMethod: cart.paymentMethod, itemPrice: cart.itemPrice, shippingPrice: cart.shippingPrice, taxPrice: cart.taxPrice, totalPrice: cart.totalPrice, })) } return (

Shipping

Shipping: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode} {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items (Edit Cart)

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? Oops! Looks like your cart is empty. Go add something o ska reka moya : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} X M {item.price} = {(item.qty * item.price).toFixed(2)} ))} )}

Order Summmery

 Items: M {cart.itemPrice} Shipping: M {cart.shippingPrice} Tax: M {cart.taxPrice} Total: M {cart.totalPrice} {error && {error}}
) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
